data.title: China completes first mission to moon and back
South-africa arrests two vietnamese having 41 kilos of rhinohorns in their bags on their way to Hanoi, Vietnam

Ebola situation in Sierra Leone is "catastrophic" and "vastly under-reported" - "There are several villages and communities that have been basically wiped out. In one of the villages I went to, there were 40 inhabitants and 39 died."
The Amazon rainforest has degraded to the point where it is losing its ability to benignly regulate weather systems, according to a stark new warning from one of Brazil’s leading scientists
Niger drops sex education from syllabus at Muslim leaders' urging
Lithuania enacts ban on energy drinks for minors, in global first
India to start destroying stockpile of illegal wildlife items such as tiger pelts, ivory to demonstrate country's commitment towards protection of the environment
The UK government has admitted for the first time that its intelligence agencies can access data collected by other international agencies about UK citizens without a warrant
Three U.S. citizens last seen with police in Mexico are found dead
ISIS executed 600 prison inmates in Mosul says Human Rights Watch
